name: Connect Punch-In
description:
An experimental team-based party game inspired by Connect 4. Choose between the four characters, Jonas, Alien Jonas, Samurai Jonas and Jonas 2, then defeat your friends in not-so-glorious combat by filling the board and punching them until they fall off the map.

Connect Punch-In can be played with up to 10 simultaneous players. If the teams are uneven, a CPU will be added to balance them out.

#PUC-SP
